price: Hakikuacha hicho kuwa kilio chao mpaka tukawafanya kama walio fyekwa, wamezimika.
arabic: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلۡكَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ حَصِيدًا خَٰمِدِينَ
footnotes: Maneno hayo hawaachi kuyakariri na kuyapigia makelele mpaka kwa adhabu yetu tukawafanya kama mimea iliyo fyekwa, na moto ulio zimika, hawana tena uhai.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā zālat til'ka daʿwāhum ḥattā jaʿalnāhum ḥaṣīdan khāmidīna
